Dialogs.Text: Thomas B: After we investigated the image with Maki, we reached the conclusion that the archive of the image didn't existed.
Thomas B: Probably to being deleted or removed from the server a short while, due to how the chat works.
Thomas B: Anyways, after reaching that conclusion, i met Chrono, another member of Maki's group and a friend of hers.
Thomas B: He showed clear distrust towards me, evidenced in the amount of questions and inquisition towards the investigation we carried.
Thomas B: Like Maki, he brought up Jack a couple of times, another member of the organization i didn't met yet.
Thomas B: After presenting ourselves and discussing the investigation, we confirmed something interesting...
Thomas B: Something regarding some members of the chat that is interesting to take into account...

Elections.CandidateName: They seem to not have been the first people to discover this server
A member had a suspiciously familiar sounding name
